value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 04: Designing Report Layouts - Part 1
value.excerpt: In this video, we introduce Report Builder, and describe a general development methodology.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course aims to empower you as a report author with the technical knowledge required to create, publish, and distribute Power BI paginated reports. value.title: Create a Table in Power BI using Enter Data and How to Edit it

value.title: Get data in Power BI
value.excerpt: You will learn how to retrieve data from a wide variety of data sources, including Microsoft Excel, relational databases, and NoSQL data stores. You will also learn how to improve performance while retrieving data.
